mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUSER ( U_NO, U_ID, U_PW, U_NAME, U_BIRTH, U_POSTCODE, U_ADDRESS, U_DETAILADDRESS, U_EXTRAADDRESS, U_PHONE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(U_NO),0)+1 FROM TUSER), #{ u_id }, #{ u_pw }, #{ u_name }, #{ u_birth }, #{ u_postcode }, #{ u_address }, #{ u_detailAddress }, #{ u_extraAddress }, #{ u_phone } )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(U_ID) FROM TUSER WHERE U_ID = #{u_id}

SELECT DISTINCT SH.SH_DATE, SH.U_NO, SH.S_NO, SH.P_ALLPRICE, SH.W_NO, SH.P_STATE, U.U_NAME, U.U_PHONE, W.W_NAME, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NAME, SH.WL_IDX FROM SALESHISTORY SH JOIN TUSER U ON SH.U_NO = U.U_NO JOIN STORE S ON SH.S_NO = S.S_NO JOIN WINELIST WL ON SH.WL_IDX = WL.WL_IDX JOIN WINE W ON WL.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE SH.U_NO = #{u_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITESTORE ( U_NO, S_NO) VALUES(#{u_no}, #{s_no})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S.S_DETAILADDRESS,F.U_NO, F.S_NO FROM FAVORITESTORE F INNER JOIN STORE S ON F.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE F.U_NO = #{u_no}
